ISSUE.TITLE: handle.writeLatin1String is not a function on Node 6.5
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Works fine on earlier versions of 6.x. ``` js net.js:732 return handle.writeLatin1String(req, data); ^ TypeError: handle.writeLatin1String is not a function at createWriteReq (net.js:732:21) at Socket._writeGeneric (net.js:702:11) at Socket._write (net.js:725:8) at doWrite (_stream_writable.js:307:12) at clearBuffer (_stream_writable.js:414:7) at Socket.Writable.uncork (_stream_writable.js:243:7) at ClientRequest._flushOutput (_http_outgoing.js:666:10) at ClientRequest.OutgoingMessage._flush (_http_outgoing.js:640:16) at _http_client.js:195:10 at callSocketMethod (_http_client.js:591:7) ``` @quarterto
